ecs

Class EcsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.MultiMap<Entity,IComponent>
      • ecs.EcsManager

  • public class EcsManager
extends MultiMap<Entity,IComponent>
    The class EcsManager provides a simple API to build games or applications using the Entity/Component/System architectural pattern. It uses reflection to store components as IComponents and deduce their type whenever it is required.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  EcsManager.ApplySystem
      A functional interface used to apply some logic to a pool of entities
